Block Metadata.content: The N+1th block proposer proposes a block, and includes a signed summary of IL transactions included from the Nth block metadata

Attestation.content: The N+1th block attesters can validate that the Nth proposers IL list was honoured, and validate the block for inclusion.

Transaction.content: The User sends a Preconfirmation request to the Nth block proposer.

Block Metadata.content: The Nth block proposer proposes the block, as well as a signed Summary and list of transactions.
